laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B. (Reference Range-Negative)
14 spot fluoroscopic images showed a stent in the pancreatic duct. The biliary tree was diffusely moderately dilated, likely due to biliary stenosis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: In the procedure, sphincterectomy and multiple balloon sweeps were performed along with obtaining cytology samples.
